revised_title: Electro-Magnetic Phenomenon: The Influence of Electricity on Mercury
tldr: The author, Humphry Davy, observed a new electro-magnetic phenomenon where the passage of electricity through mercury caused it to become agitated, forming cones and vortices. The phenomenon could not be attributed to common electrical repulsion or heat, and it appeared to be a novel kind of effect. The author also mentioned that the phenomenon could not be explained by the idea of electro-magnetic results being produced by the transition currents or motions of a single imponderable fluid.
